# Interpret the data

::: columns
::: column
```{r}
#| echo: false
flights_delay |>
  select(name, delay_category) |>
  tbl_summary(
    by = name
  ) |> 
  as_gt() |> 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "#FFFBC8")
      ),
    locations = cells_body(rows = 2, columns = "stat_1")
  )
```
:::



::: {.column .fragment}

56% of flights

|  <!-- -->          |  <!-- -->      |
|-------------------:|:---------------|
| departing from JFK | departed early |   
| arriving at JFK    | arrived early  |   
| departing from JFK | arrived early  |
| arriving at JFK    | departed early |



:::
:::
